sentences.sentence: Uncle Sebastian used to tease Mother and Daddy unmercifully that all they could produce was girls.
sentences.translation: 塞巴斯蒂安叔叔曾无情地取笑爸爸妈妈说他们只能生出女孩来。

sentences.sentence: Geppetto, no doubt, will beat him unmercifully, he is so mean and cruel!
sentences.translation: 毫无疑问，杰佩托会毫不留情地揍他的，他太卑鄙、太残忍了！

sentences.sentence: With these words, he grabbed the log with both hands and started to knock it about unmercifully.
sentences.translation: 说着，他用两只手抓住木头，开始无情地敲打它。
